Proud Owner Of A Crown <3

Hey Everyone!

So this past Saturday NIght I was in the Miss Teen Arizona pageant (even though i dont live in Az- you can still enter.)

Well, I felt like i did prety well, and at the end of the night when it was time for results, they announced my name for the top 5 girls!!!! Then they narrowed us down to three... I made it through once again! finally, they called they names of the final two. they said one girls name, then said "And Kelly Mendez" !!! I made it to the final two!!

Then, breathing heavily, and having our nerves kicking , I was crowned Miss Teen Arizona 2007-2008!!!!!!!!
Im sooo happy! IT was my crowning moment! Im so blessed and i cant wait for this year to get into action!!! =]

i knda wish my mother was there to see me take the Crown, but oh well. its tough. but im so happy =]

thanks guys!!!

<3333
